welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Long Hill, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a cafe, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Waterbury-Oxford Airport serves commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at New Haven Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
